text.section: An appeal from the commissioner shall be taken only from a final order on hearing and in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
The appeal shall be granted as a matter of right, and shall be taken to the Franklin Circuit Court.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 953, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 230, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 2, sec. 37, effective June 18, 1970.
